ygData.subject: Re: Pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: Shurikens,practice and patience. The only way to get better is to practice. learn how the mobs react to you, dont expect to sort them all out and have one left
ygData.messageBody:
Shurikens,practice and patience. The only way to get better is to practice.
learn how the mobs react to you, dont expect to sort them all out and have
one left with one FD. Pull three FD, wait for one to leave and pop up pull
the next two a little further repeat. Narukami on the E-Marr server is the
best feign puller I have ever seen. he can split mobs that I didnt think
could be split ;) and this was the advice he gave me.

Kizmet Bayashi
40th level monk
Da`Kor
E-Marr


----- Original Message -----
From: Dave Woomer <dwoomer@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, October 08, 1999 11:08 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Pulling


> From: "Dave Woomer" <dwoomer@...>
>
> Speaking of pulling, would some of you more experienced brothers and
sisters
> post some tips and hints? I've been having a lot of trouble getting the
hang
> of separating the mobs and pulling safely when we're in a dungeon.
>
> Thanks!
>
> >
